httpssecretUrlWithVersion.value: <uri with version of the pfx cert secret> e.g. https://mykeyvault.vault.azure.net/secrets/myPfxCert2/11f95456772549a2b6b0ba38bd1b319a

httpssecretCaUrlWithVersion.value: <uri with version of the pfx cert secret> e.g. https://mykeyvault.vault.azure.net/secrets/myPfxCert2/11f95456772549a2b6b0ba38bd1b319a

reference.secretName: <the password secret from the above keyVault> e.g. VMSSAdminPass

certificateStore.value: <the cert store name on the target VM> e.g. myPfxCert2

certificateDomain.value: <the fully qualified domain name for which the cert is installed> e.g. www.mycompany.com for wildcard use *.mycompany.com
